pages.text: A singularly powerful spell that summons a temporal rift which freezes all entities (excluding players) in time, stopping them from performing any actions.$(br2)With modifiers, you can adjust which entities are affected, excluding peaceful creatures or familiars from being stopped, as well as inflicting status effects once the time stop ends.

pages.title: Spell Configuration
pages.text: $(bold)Cooldown:$() The spell has a cooldown of $(spell:time_stop/SECONDS/cooldown) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Duration:$() The duration of the time stop field is $(spell:time_stop/SECONDS/duration) seconds. With the $(modifier:overtime)$() modifier, this duration is extended by a further $(spell:time_stop/SECONDS/overtime) seconds.$(br2)If the $(modifier:minor_halt)$() modifier is enabled, the duration of the time stop is instead limited to $(spell:time_stop/SECONDS/undertime) seconds.

$(bold)Radius:$() The size of the time stop effect is $(spell:time_stop/radius_x) and $(spell:time_stop/radius_z) blocks horizontally. The y axis extends $(spell:time_stop/radius_y) blocks vertically from the location where the time stop was created.$(br2)$(bold)Peaceful:$() With the $(modifier:peaceful_passage)$() modifier enabled, peaceful and non-hostile entities will not be affected by the time stop.$(br2)$(bold)Familiars:$() With the $(modifier:freed_familiars)$() modifier enabled, any entity that is a familiar or is tamed by you will not be

affected by the time stop.$(br2)$(bold)Slow:$() With the $(modifier:time_slip)$() modifier enabled, entities that are affected by the time stop will also be given Slowness $(spell:time_stop/ROMAN/slowness_amplifier) for $(spell:time_stop/SECONDS/slowness_duration) seconds when the time stop ends.$(br2)$(bold)Weakness:$() With the $(modifier:draining_stop)$() modifier enabled, entities that are affected by the time stop will also be given Weakness $(spell:time_stop/ROMAN/weakness_amplifier) for $(spell:time_stop/SECONDS/weakness_duration) seconds when the time stop ends.

$(bold)Speed:$() If the $(modifier:hasty_escape)$() modifier is enabled, you are given Speed $(spell:time_stop/ROMAN/speed_amplifier) for $(spell:time_stop/SECONDS/speed_duration) seconds after casting the spell.$(br2)$(bold)Cold:$() With the $(modifier:ice_age)$() modifier enabled, entities affected by the time stop take $(spell:time_stop/HEART/cold_damage) hearts of cold damage when the effect ends.$(br2)$(bold)Fire:$() With the $(modifier:burn_in_hell)$() modifier enabled, entities are set ablaze for $(spell:time_stop/fire_duration) seconds, refreshing once the effect ends.
